keywords.indexterm: Document type configuration dialog boxTemplates tab

body.p: The Templates tab specifies a list of directories where new document templates are located for this particular framework. These directories, along with the document templates that are saved inside them, will appear in the New Document wizardNew from templates wizard inside the Framework templates category according to your framework and the directory path you specify in this tab.
To open the Templates tab of the Document type configuration dialog box, , go to Document Type Association, use the New, Edit, Duplicate, or Extend button, and click on the Templates tab.

The Templates tab includes the following actions:
New Opens a dialog box that allows you to specify the path to a directory that contains document templates for this framework.
Edit Opens a dialog box that allows you to edit the path of a directory that contains document templates for this framework.
Delete Deletes the currently selected template directory from the list.
Move Up Moves the selected template directory up one spot in the list.
Move Down Moves the selected template directory down one spot in the list.
